Robo.Solumax.queryFindInvoicesPending: select * from romaneio (nolock) where Download is null

select distinct a.metadata_json ->> '211' as Nr_romaneio, a.id, a.metadata_json ->> '152' as CNPJ, a.metadata_json ->> '151' as SERIE, a.metadata_json ->> '141' as NF, TO_DATE(a.metadata_json ->> '148', 'DD/MM/YYYY') as EMISSAO,a.metadata_json ->> '203' as DATA_PROXIMA_CAPTURA,case when a.metadata_json ->> '146' = '1' then 'DISPONIVEL' when a.metadata_json ->> '146' = '2' then 'NAO DISPONIVEL' else '' end as STATUS_DIGITALIZACAO, case when a.metadata_json ->> '147' = '3' then 'DISPONIVEL' when a.metadata_json ->> '147' = '4' then 'NAO DISPONIVEL' else '' end as STATUS_INTEGRACAO, a.metadata_json ->> '155' as TRANSPORTADORA from document a where a.document_type_id = 4 and a.metadata_json ->> '155' = 'ROMANEIO' and a.metadata_json ->> '146' = '2' and right(a.metadata_json ->> '148',4) || substring(a.metadata_json ->> '148',4,2) || left(a.metadata_json ->> '148',2) >= '20201101' and a.metadata_json ->> '211' is not null

select distinct a.id, a.metadata_json ->> '152' as CNPJ, a.metadata_json ->> '151' as SERIE, a.metadata_json ->> '141' as NF, TO_DATE(a.metadata_json ->> '148', 'DD/MM/YYYY') as EMISSAO,a.metadata_json ->> '203' as DATA_PROXIMA_CAPTURA,case when a.metadata_json ->> '146' = '1' then 'DISPONIVEL' when a.metadata_json ->> '146' = '2' then 'NAO DISPONIVEL' else '' end as STATUS_DIGITALIZACAO, case when a.metadata_json ->> '147' = '3' then 'DISPONIVEL' when a.metadata_json ->> '147' = '4' then 'NAO DISPONIVEL' else '' end as STATUS_INTEGRACAO, a.metadata_json ->> '155' as TRANSPORTADORA, a.metadata_json ->> '211' as Nr_romaneio from document a where a.document_type_id = 4 and a.metadata_json ->> '155' = 'ROMANEIO' and a.metadata_json ->> '146' = '2' and a.metadata_json ->> '211' in ('CMV0079732','CMV0127134','CMV0130273','CMV0130066','CMV0080914')
Robo.Solumax.queryUpdateInvoice: update romaneio set Dt_Download = @date, Nr_Paginas = @Nr_Paginas, Download = @Download where Id = @id
UPDATE document SET metadata_json = jsonb_set(metadata_json, '{203}', '"@date"', TRUE) WHERE id = @id
Robo.Solumax.queryUpdateInvoice_2: UPDATE document SET metadata_json_upper = jsonb_set(metadata_json_upper,'{203}','"@date"',TRUE) WHERE id =@id
